introduction: You've heard that CBD is prescribed for anxiety, but you also heard that it may affect your liver, which is indicated by abnormal liver enzymes tests. You would like to know how CBD affects liver enzymes.
question: how does cbd effect liver enzymes?

answers.text: Cannabidiol (CBD) is a non-psychoactive (not causing 'high') chemical found in Cannabis (marijuana).

ref.title: What You Need to Know (And What We're Working to Find Out) About Products Containing Cannabis or Cannabis-derived Compounds, Including CBD
The Role of Cannabidiol in Liver Disease: A Systemic Review
ref.text: Review Int J Mol Sci. 2024 Feb 17; Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Jeonbuk National University Medical School, Jeonju 54896, Republic of Korea.

answers.text: Some studies show that it causes liver enzymes to be higher than normal, which shows CBD in higher doses damages liver.

ref.title: Cannabidiol (CBD): What we know and what we don't

answers.text: Other studies found that in healthy adults CBD is not linked to higher liver enzymes, and it may be protective in some liver diseases and other cases.

ref.title: Observed Impact of Long-Term Consumption of Oral Cannabidiol on Liver Function in Healthy Adults
ref.text: Observational Study in Cannabis Cannabinoid Res. 2023 Feb

task.question: The answers about CBD you found at the NLM site:
options: Explained how CBD affects the liver
Explained the relation between the liver enzyme tests and liver damage
Based on the answers, you decided to ask your doctor about CBD for your anxiety
Based on the answers, you decided to ask your doctor about anxiety treatments other than CBD
